NGUY Ễ N TU Ấ N V Ũ
Project Manager / ERP Consultant
-  Ward 25, Binh Thanh district, Ho Chi Minh city
12/01/1990
Male https:/ /nguyentuanvu.odoo.com/
https:/ /linkedin.com/in/nguyen-tuanvu/

As a person with a keen interest in technology, graphics, photography, and the arts, I always enjoy learning and exploring new things. With my accumulated experience and passion for incorporating information technology into business operations, specically in the ERP eld, I am happy to help business owners manage their corporations with transparent data and workows, and deliver highquality results that meet their needs. Besides, I am eager to participate in projects that offer valuable benets to

- Take responsibility for ERP Implementation projects (Vietnam and Overseas) - Create Project Estimation, Planning and Budget control
- Project Tasks and Quality control
- Track milestones, deliverables, and change requests.
- Project Team Management (Team OKRs, project issues, allocated resources, team motivation)
- Cooperation with AM/Sales to nalize the contract's value and determine the project scope
- Discuss potential projects and their parameters with clients
- ERP consultant: Discuss with Clients about their business process and give them the appropriate consultants and solutions
- Coaching and discussing with team members for team quality improvement in needed.
- Assisting the Regional Delivery Manager (Vietnam and Japan) to investigate internal and external issues related to projects and team operation
- Oversee and measure project performance using Portcities's in-house project management tool

- Member of Seedcom's MIS Team
- Our focus is on the missions related to the ERP system: Oracle EBS / Acumatica ERP on elds namely: Distribution (Purchasing, Wholesales, and Inventory Management), Retail, Services, Manufacturing, Finance, and so on...)
- Business Operation support for Seedcom's subsidiaries, in charge of Distribution (Sales, Purchasing), Inventory, Finance, and System Management. Ensure the business processes go well and smoothly.
- Analyzing client's requirements to give the appropriate solutions/advice (take advantage of the ERP practices or customize new functions).
- Finding and analyzing business processes and workow issues to propose the appropriate solutions and workarounds.
- Coordinating with team members to develop the additional ERP Reports used for daily operations.
- Analyzing and mapping for integration projects (WMS, DMS, and the Seedcom inhouse systems).
01/2019 -04/2023
04/2023 -present users and create innovative products that add value to the community.

Project Management
ERP System (Acumatica ERP / Oracle
EBS / Odoo)
Teamwork/Team management
Service Client
Using Wireframe Tools
Adobe Photoshop
Adobe Illustrator
MS SQL
BI Tools (Metabase, Superset)

- Football
Travel
Photography
- Analyzing and building features for the new system projects (modules, wireframes, and owcharts,) which are used for digitizing the business operations.
- Building the Financial Statements based on Accountant's needs

- Writing FRS Documents
- Getting feedback from Customers and analyzing to optimize current applications

- Operating the company's IT system
- Administrating of Call Center Sati system: The most stable call center in Vietnam
- Deploying POS retail and online sales model: Teamcrop (February 2016 - October 2016)
- Deploying OSS system: Online sales and retail POS module, business approval slip management module (payment slip, request slip, etc.) HR management module.
- Implementing iziHelp system: Customer Service system, Process customers' feedback from various channel sources such as Facebook, Zalo, email, Callcenter, and web chat. Internal tickets
- Coordinating with the team to deploy the Odoo system: CRM module, Warehouse module, Sales module, Customer management module
- Coordinating Deploying DMS system: Customer management services are agents, supermarket chains, CVS chains; Wholesale order; Sales team manager; KPIs based on criteria/revenue; check-in/checkout at point of sale; sales routes; Update market price information; Discount Management / Sales promotion programs.
- Coordinating deployment of Oracle systems
- Implementing Hearme survey feedback receiving system: NPS / eNPS, CSAT, CES Survey
- Receiving requests from departments, mapping, and analysis to build the system in the direction appropriate to the operation.
- Receiving requests, analyze and build a management reporting system
- Training new employees to use IT systems and bringing them into daily working life Projects:
- Deploying and managing OSS internal management system
- Deploying POS retail system: Teamcrop, OSS
- Deploying customer service system and iziHelp tickets
- Deploying DMS system - managing distributors.
- Deploying Oracle system
- Deploying the Odoo system
- Implementing Hearme system - Survey and evaluation

- Technology Solutions
- Managing IT systems
03/2016 -11/2018
11/2018 -12/2018
07/2014 -01/2016
- Web design
- SEOer: Make main keywords to the top 10 Google
- Branding design: Logo, Banners for new projects

- Receiving requests from customers
- Offering software solutions that suit market needs

- Participate in corporate culture activities with the company
- Coaching junior members to understand the business processes and how to approach clients
- Pre-sale: Meet with customers to understand their business processes, propose suitable solutions, dene the scope of work, and provide cost estimates.

- Participate in corporate culture activities with the company
- Participating in the training of Organizational Culture, Integrity, and Teambuilding
- Running
Binh Tran - Port Cities Vietnam Director
Ngô Xuân B ằ ng - MIS Director
2016 -2023
02/2014 -06/2014
2009 -2013
2023 -present
